src:
Prediksi Badak Lampung Vs Arema FC di Liga 1 Pekan 26 Jumat Ini
01 Nov 2019, 04:07 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Perseru Badak Lampung FC akan menjamu Arema FC dalam lanjutan Liga 1 pekan ke-26 di Stadion Sumpah Pemuda, Bandar Lampung, Jumat, 1 November 2019. Pertandingan akan berlangsung mulai 15.30 WIB dan akan disiarkan Indosiar.

Kabar Perseru Badak Lampung

Milan Petrovic akan akan berjumpa klub yang dilatihnya musim lalu. Ia mengaku sudah sangat siap untuk menjalani laga nanti.
Pelatih asal Slovenia, mengaku tahu betul seperti apa kekuatan tim yang kini dilatih Milor Seslija tersebut. "Kami menghormati Arema karena mereka adalah tim yang bagus dan dihuni banyak pemain bagus. Tetapi, kami juga akan berupaya meraih yang terbaik pada setiap pertandingan," kata dia seperti dikutip laman Liga Indonesia.
Milan Petrovic sama sekali tidak menganggap remeh kekuatan Arema yang ditinggal sejumlah pilarnya. "Saya pikir tidak ada masalah dengan absennya para pemain itu. Sebab, jika melihat susunan pemain mereka, masih ada pemain berkualitas seperti Dendi Santoso atau Rifaldi Bawuo di sana," katanya.
Arema FC datang tanpa kekuatan terbaiknya. Dua penyerang utama Dedik Setiawan dan Sylvano Comvalius absen karena cedera. Hendro Siswanto tidak bermain karena sakit. Sedangkan, Hanif Sjahbandi dan M. Rafli absen karena panggilan Timnas Indonesia U-23.
Perseru sendiri tidak berada dalam kondisi bagus. Bojan Malisic dan kawan-kawan tidak pernah menang dalam enam laga terakhir. Badak Lampung juga kesulitan mencetak gol.

Kabar Arema FC

Arema FC memasang target tinggi pada laga pekan ke-26 ini. Pelatih Arema FC, Milomir Seslija, mengatakan bahwa meraih tiga poin di kandang Badak Lampung sangat penting. Sebab, Singo Edan kini butuh tambahan poin untuk bersaing dalam perebutan posisi kedua klasemen Shopee Liga 1.
"Ini adalah pertandingan yang berat karena Badak Lampung ingin mendapat poin di kandang. Kami datang ke sini untuk mendapat poin karena kami mengejar posisi kedua klasemen," kata dia.
Arema punya peluang besar untuk bisa mendapat poin penuh. Sebab, Badak Lampung kini tidak berada dalam performa terbaik. Laskar Saburai tidak pernah menang dalam enam laga terakhir di Shopee Liga 1.
Faktor tersebut tentu menguntungkan kubu Arema FC. Namun demikian, Milomir Seslija tidak ingin anak asuhnnya tinggi hati melihat performa buruk sang lawan. Pelatih asal Bosnia justru khawatir dengan momen kebangkitan Badak Lampung saat berjumpa Arema.
"Belum tentu itu menguntungkan. Justru kami khawatir pemain Badak Lampung akan semakin termotivasi untuk menang setelah beberapa hasil buruk. Semua tim di Indonesia tidak bisa ditebak," kata pelatih berusia 55 tahun.

Performa Terkini dan Posisi Klasemen

Arema hanya menang dua kali dalam lima laga terakhirnya. Pekan lalu mereka menang 1-0 atas Semen Padang. Kini tim Singo Edan itu berada di posisi keenam klasemen dengan nilai 38 dari 24 laga.
Perseru Badak Lampung gagal menang dalam lima laga terakhirnya, termasuk empat kali kalah beruntun. Mereka terpuruk di zona degradasi (urutan 16) dengan nilai 23 dari 25 laga.

Riwayat Pertemuan Kedua Tim

Dalam lima pertemuan terakhir kedua tim, Arema menang tiga kali, sedangkan Perseru hanya menang sekali. Laga terkini keduanya, 16 Juli 2019, berakhir 4-1 untuk kemenangan Arema.

Prediksi Hasil

Perseru Badak Lampung memiliki rekor buruk di kandangnya. Mereka kalah 6 kali dan seri 6 kali dari 13 laga. Rekor Arema di laga tandang juga tak bagus karena hanya menang sekali dalam 11 laga. Namun, melihat tren terkini kedua tim dan posisi dalam klasemen, Arema FC lebih diunggulkan untuk menang di laga ini.

LIGA INDONESIA
text:
Lampung vs Rhino Predictions Arema FC in League 1 Week 26 This Friday
Nov 01 2019, 04:07 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Perseru Badak Lampung FC will host Arema FC in the continuation of League 1 Week 26 at the Youth Pledge Stadium, Bandar Lampung, Friday, November 1, 2019. The match will start at 15.30 WIB and will be broadcast by Indosiar.

Kaberu Persak Badak Lampung

Milan Petrovic will meet the club he coached last season. He claimed to have been very ready to undergo the fight later.
The coach from Slovenia, claimed to know very well what the strength of the team that is now being trained by Milor Seslija. "We respect Arema because they are a good team and inhabited by many good players. But, we will also try to achieve the best in every game," he was quoted as saying on the Indonesian League website.
Milan Petrovic did not underestimate the power of Arema who left behind a number of pillars. "I think there is no problem with the absence of the players. Because, if you look at the composition of their players, there are still quality players like Dendi Santoso or Rifaldi Bawuo there," he said.
Arema FC comes without its best strength. The two main attackers Dedik Setiawan and Sylvano Comvalius were absent because of injuries. Hendro Siswanto did not play because he was sick. Meanwhile, Hanif Sjahbandi and M. Rafli were absent due to the call of the Indonesian National Team U-23.
Perseru itself is not in good condition. Bojan Malisic and his friends have never won in the last six matches. Lampung Rhinos are also having trouble scoring goals.

Arema FC news

Arema FC set a high target in the 26th week of action. Arema FC coach, Milomir Seslija, said that winning three points at home to the Lampung Rhinos was very important. Because, Singo Edan now needs additional points to compete in the race for second place Shopee League 1 standings.
"This was a tough match because the Lampung rhino wanted to get points at home. We came here to get points because we are chasing second place standings," he said.
Arema has a great chance to get full points. Because, Lampung Rhinos are not currently in the best performance. Sabkar Warriors have not won in the last six matches in Shopee Liga 1.
These factors certainly benefit the Arema FC camp. However, Milomir Seslija did not want his foster children to be arrogant to see the opponent's poor performance. The Bosnian coach was worried about the moment of the rhino rise in Lampung when he met Arema.
"Not necessarily that is profitable. In fact we are worried that Lampung rhino players will be increasingly motivated to win after some bad results. All teams in Indonesia are unpredictable," said the 55-year-old coach.

Current Performance and Standings Position

Arema has only won twice in his last five matches. Last week they won 1-0 over Semen Padang. Now the Singo Edan team is in sixth place with 38 from 24 matches.
Lampung rhino Perseru failed to win in the last five games, including four successive defeats. They slumped in the relegation zone (sequence 16) with a value of 23 from 25 matches.

History of the Second Team Meeting

In the last five meetings of the two teams, Arema won three times, while Perseru only won once. His second most recent match, July 16, 2019, ended 4-1 for Arema's victory.

Prediction Results

Lampung rhino Perseru has a bad record at home. They lost 6 and drawn 6 of 13 matches. Arema's record in away games is also not good because it only won once in 11 matches. However, seeing the latest trends of both teams and positions in the standings, Arema FC is more favored to win this match.

INDONESIA LIGA
